properties.name: Musandam Fjords
properties.description: Norway of Arabia with dramatic limestone cliffs plunging into turquoise waters

properties.name: Wadi Shab
properties.description: Emerald pools, hidden waterfalls, and a secret cave accessible by swimming through rock passage

properties.name: Wahiba Sands
properties.description: Rolling golden dunes perfect for desert camping and 4x4 adventures

properties.name: Sultan Qaboos Grand Mosque
properties.description: Magnificent mosque with world's largest handwoven carpet

properties.name: Jebel Shams
properties.description: Grand Canyon of Oman with 1,000m gorge

properties.name: Salalah
properties.description: Gateway to Dhofar region. Monsoon-fed greenery, frankincense trees, and RoRo port for vehicle shipping from East Africa.

properties.name: Wadi Darbat
properties.description: Stunning seasonal waterfall and lake in Dhofar. Green during khareef (monsoon) July-September.

properties.name: Land of Frankincense
properties.description: UNESCO World Heritage sites including Wadi Dawkah frankincense groves and ancient port of Al-Baleed.
